base_description: Rectangular white cabinet with drawer and door.
part_description: One top drawer, one lower door, metal handles on each, rectangular shape.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out on metal tracks, while the door swings open on hinges. The handles are fixed to the drawer and door, providing grip points for operation.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a counter. It interacts with users who open the drawer and door to store or retrieve items. It may also interact with adjacent furniture in a room setting.
